overview: The personal travel diary of a naive dreamer in search of an ancient tale told by a scoundrel. A roaming through ancient India, as time passes, will bring the observer's eye to confuse the illusion of false truth with the awareness of a lie that is truer than truth. The discovery of a tribe of fairy-tale children, the Ananda, that appear and disappear along a road dense with magic and primitive superstition will lead to the search of a lost dream. (IMDB)
title: Ananda
